card.name: Aegis Angel
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

card.name: Alabaster Mage
card.property: {1} {W}: Target creature you control gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We hold sacred the powers of light and life. Truth and honor are our greatest weapons." —Alabaster creed

card.name: Angelic Destiny
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and first strike, and is an Angel in addition to its other types. When enchanted creature dies, return Angelic Destiny to its owner's hand.

card.name: Angel's Mercy
card.property: You gain 7 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Angels appear before both the blessed and the cursed, though most don't know which they are until they feel either the angel's kiss or her sword.

card.name: Arbalest Elite
card.property: {2} {W}, {T}: Arbalest Elite deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Arbalest Elite doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are few things as satisfying as a good, healthy thunk.

card.name: Archon of Justice
card.property: Flying When Archon of Justice dies, exile target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In dark times, Truth bears a blade.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When we of the Northern Verge claim a mount, no peasant's nag will do. It must be as strong as our virtue, and must join us of its own will." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

card.name: Assault Griffin
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Griffins do not serve. They give freely to those they trust." —Amira, skycaptain of Thune

card.name: Auramancer
card.property: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

card.name: Benalish Veteran
card.property: Whenever Benalish Veteran attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day I will rest and join my comrades in the afterlife, but not while scum like you still sully this world."

card.name: Celestial Purge
card.property: Exile target black or red permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A world without evil? Boring. Give me vile fiends to smite and banish any day." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

card.name: Day of Judgment
card.property: Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Demystify
card.property: Destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Behind every mage is a trail of shattered lies.

card.name: Divine Favor
card.property: Enchant creature When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

card.name: Gideon Jura
card.property: +2: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. −2: Destroy target tapped creature. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

card.name: Gideon's Avenger
card.property: Whenever a creature an opponent controls becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on Gideon's Avenger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The good don't sit and wait for the evil to act. They prepare to defend. They prepare to punish."

card.name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

card.name: Grand Abolisher
card.property: During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your superstitions and mumblings are useless chaff before my righteousness."

card.name: Griffin Rider
card.property: As long as you control a Griffin creature, Griffin Rider gets +3/+3 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After fighting alongside the griffin riders, older knights of Thune learned to admire a mount that could rip an enemy to shreds in seconds.

card.name: Griffin Sentinel
card.property: Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

card.name: Guardians' Pledge
card.property: White creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dozen fighting for each other are worth a thousand fighting for themselves.

card.name: Honor of the Pure
card.property: White creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Together the soldiers were like a golden blade, cutting down their enemies and scarring the darkness.

card.name: Lifelink
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spoils of war are not measured only in gold and silver.

card.name: Mesa Enchantress
card.property: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Scholars seek to understand the way the world is. I wish to shape the world into what it should be."

card.name: Mighty Leap
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The southern fortress taken by invaders? Heh, sure . . . when elephants fly." —Brezard Skeinbow, captain of the guard

card.name: Oblivion Ring
card.property: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

card.name: Peregrine Griffin
card.property: Flying First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A griffin is not just an eagle's wings and a lion's claws. It is also the fiercest of hearts.

card.name: Personal Sanctuary
card.property: During your turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is a place deep within my soul where no foe can intrude and no tyrant can conquer." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

card.name: Pride Guardian
card.property: Defender Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any hotheaded cub can raise a sword in anger."

card.name: Roc Egg
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Roc Egg dies, create a 3/3 white Bird creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A thin shell lies between the roc and a world of bite-sized treats.

card.name: Serra Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The walls of the wicked will fall before us. Ready the siege engines. We proceed to war!" —General Avitora

card.name: Spirit Mantle
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has protection from creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shield of unimpeachable purity is as strong as any wrought on the anvil.

card.name: Stave Off
card.property: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Stonehorn Dignitary
card.property: When Stonehorn Dignitary enters the battlefield, target opponent skips their next combat phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.

card.name: Stormfront Pegasus
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its hooves touch the earth only when a hero must rise.

card.name: Sun Titan
card.property: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing sun that never sets.

card.name: Timely Reinforcements
card.property: If you have less life than an opponent, you gain 6 life. If you control fewer creatures than an opponent, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gods are not always kind, but they do have a soft spot for plucky underdogs.

card.name: Aether Adept
card.property: When Aether Adept enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The universe is my instrument, and the song I play upon it is one you are forbidden to hear."

card.name: Alluring Siren
card.property: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She lures victims with promises of flesh, captures them in a net of deceit, and destroys them in the embrace of the sea.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The amphin have long built their society in secret. While surface dwellers squabbled over trivial borders, they patiently expanded, building their ammonite temple-caves. Now amphin priests eye the shore, and amphin hunters gird for war." —Gor Muldrak, Cryptohistories

card.name: Aven Fleetwing
card.property: Flying Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It was too fast, even for our veteran archers. They might as well have been blowing it kisses." —Vulok, elvish archer

card.name: Azure Mage
card.property: {3} {U}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived." —Azure creed

card.name: Belltower Sphinx
card.property: Flying Whenever a source deals damage to Belltower Sphinx, that source's controller puts that many cards from the top of their library into their graveyard.

card.name: Cancel
card.property: Counter target spell.

card.name: Chasm Drake
card.property: Flying Whenever Chasm Drake attacks, target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once he's got you, hold on. Fall from a drake and you'll suffer much worse than a bruise." —Garl, drake trainer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk are best known for their subtle magic. But those who try to fight them in their own territory quickly realize that merfolk are hardly defenseless on the field of battle.

card.name: Divination
card.property: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you." —Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

card.name: Djinn of Wishes
card.property: Flying Djinn of Wishes enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it. {2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from Djinn of Wishes: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.

card.name: Flashfreeze
card.property: Counter target red or green spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is cold merely the absence of heat, or a force unto itself? Would a display of its power help you decide?" —Zubarek, Icewinder Magus

card.name: Flight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who claim to know the world in its entirety rarely have the requisite perspective." —Ulmarus the Wise

card.name: Frost Breath
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you have to be stuck somewhere for a while, it's better to be stuck there with a friend.

card.name: Frost Titan
card.property: Whenever Frost Titan becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}. Whenever Frost Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Harbor Serpent
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Harbor Serpent can't attack unless there are five or more Islands on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like most giant monsters villagers worship as gods, it proves a fickle master.

card.name: Ice Cage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. When enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy Ice Cage.

card.name: Jace, Memory Adept
card.property: +1: Draw a card. Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. 0: Target player puts the top ten cards of their library into their graveyard. −7: Any number of target players each draw twenty cards.

card.name: Jace's Archivist
card.property: {U}, {T}: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a sacred duty. Master Beleren's trust has bought an eternity of my loyalty."

card.name: Jace's Erasure
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, you may have target player put the top card of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You should try to clear your mind of idle thoughts. And if you can't, I will."

card.name: Levitation
card.property: Creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why fight over scraps of land when there's so much sky waiting to be claimed?"

card.name: Lord of the Unreal
card.property: Illusion creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dream does not end until I say so."

card.name: Mana Leak
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fatal flaw in every plan is the assumption that you know more than your enemy.

card.name: Master Thief
card.property: When Master Thief enters the battlefield, gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Master Thief.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Possession is ten-tenths of the law.

card.name: Merfolk Looter
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

card.name: Merfolk Mesmerist
card.property: {U}, {T}: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't you think if I saw a half-woman, half-fish with three glowing eyes, I'd have remembered?" —Drugo, town guard

card.name: Mind Control
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every primitive mind has a motive. Easy to find, and eminently exploitable." —Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Mind Unbound
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a lore counter on Mind Unbound, then draw a card for each lore counter on Mind Unbound.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The creations of the hand are confined by reality. The creations of the mind know no such limits.

card.name: Negate
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

card.name: Phantasmal Bear
card.property: When Phantasmal Bear becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You know it to be false, but when its claws find you, what you know won't matter much at all." —Pol Jamaar, illusionist

card.name: Phantasmal Dragon
card.property: Flying When Phantasmal Dragon becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its hunger and ire are no less for being wrought of lies and mist.

card.name: Phantasmal Image
card.property: You may have Phantasmal Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

card.name: Ponder
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

card.name: Redirect
card.property: You may choose new targets for target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's actually quite simple, but since you've only recently begun to walk upright, it may take some time to explain." —Jace Beleren, to Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Skywinder Drake
card.property: Flying Skywinder Drake can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's so light and fragile that it can glide where the air is thinnest.

card.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
card.property: Flying When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Time Reversal
card.property: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Time Reversal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any oaf can conquer a kingdom. It takes true power to conquer time." —Shai Fusan, archmage

card.name: Turn to Frog
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

card.name: Unsummon
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's nothing personal. I'd just prefer if you weren't." —Ashurel, voidmage

card.name: Visions of Beyond
card.property: Draw a card. If a graveyard has twenty or more cards in it, draw three cards instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The past is the foundation for all that exists in the present. We merely reconstruct what our ancestors have already discovered." —Sachimir, Sage of Memories

card.name: Blood Seeker
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may have that player lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A drop now is all he needs to find you later.

card.name: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.

card.name: Bloodrage Vampire
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most genteel facades hide the most abominable desires.

card.name: Brink of Disaster
card.property: Enchant creature or land When enchanted permanent becomes tapped, destroy it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you find yourself teetering on the edge of oblivion, mine will be the hands taking pleasure in giving you the final push." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Call to the Grave
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature. At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

card.name: Cemetery Reaper
card.property: Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Child of Night
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

card.name: Consume Spirit
card.property: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You clerics brag about your strength of spirit, yet I take away the tiniest fragment, and you crumple like a rag doll." —Sorin Markov

card.name: Dark Favor
card.property: Enchant creature When Dark Favor enters the battlefield, you lose 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When he began to curse what he held holy, his strength grew unrivaled.

card.name: Deathmark
card.property: Destroy target green or white creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the final vision of doom be etched upon their unblinking eyes." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

card.name: Devouring Swarm
card.property: Flying Sacrifice a creature: Devouring Swarm gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their arrival is heralded by the deafening hum of ten thousand wings. Their departure is marked by the silence of the dead.

card.name: Diabolic Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise always keep an ear open to the whispers of power.

card.name: Disentomb
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stop complaining. You can rest when you're dead. Oh—sorry." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Distress
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course I'm sure I've gone mad. The little man who crawled out of my eye was quite clear on this."

card.name: Doom Blade
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Drifting Shade
card.property: Flying {B}: Drifting Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It stalks the fens by the light of the full moon, gathering shadows as it floats among them.

card.name: Duskhunter Bat
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swamps go silent at its approach, but it still hears the heartbeat of the prey within.

card.name: Grave Titan
card.property: Deathtouch Whenever Grave Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His grim ritual ushers the dead to their new life.

card.name: Hideous Visage
card.property: Creatures you control gain intimidate until end of turn. (Each of those creatures can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seeing you cower before me is its own reward."

card.name: Mind Rot
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not every thought is a good one.

card.name: Monomania
card.property: Target player chooses a card in their hand and discards the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do vermin cling to when all hope is lost?" —Sorin Markov

card.name: Onyx Mage
card.property: {1} {B}: Target creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We wield death and darkness, powers that make lesser mages tremble in fear." —Onyx creed

card.name: Reassembling Skeleton
card.property: {1} {B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

card.name: Royal Assassin
card.property: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An assassin is a king's most trusted courier, ensuring his messages are heard by even the most unwilling recipients.

card.name: Rune-Scarred Demon
card.property: Flying When Rune-Scarred Demon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The litany of the infernal on his flesh pulses to the beating of his dark heart.

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

card.name: Smallpox
card.property: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.

card.name: Sorin Markov
card.property: +2: Sorin Markov deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life. −3: Target opponent's life total becomes 10. −7: You control target player during that player's next turn.

card.name: Sorin's Thirst
card.property: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

card.name: Sorin's Vengeance
card.property: Sorin's Vengeance deals 10 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 10 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cherish these last moments. Though your miserable life has come to nothing, I have given it a magnificent end."

card.name: Sutured Ghoul
card.property: Trample As Sutured Ghoul enters the battlefield, exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.

card.name: Taste of Blood
card.property: Taste of Blood deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no dreads, to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings nothing but sweet dreams." —Bram Stoker, Dracula

card.name: Tormented Soul
card.property: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

card.name: Vampire Outcasts
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

card.name: Vengeful Pharaoh
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Whenever combat damage is dealt to you or a planeswalker you control, if Vengeful Pharaoh is in your graveyard, destroy target attacking creature, then put Vengeful Pharaoh on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ghouls are often found skulking on the fringes of great battles, showing themselves only to snatch the wounded and weak, dragging their victims screaming into the shadows.

card.name: Wring Flesh
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't blame me. You're the one walking around with skin." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers." —Zul Ashur, lich lord

card.name: Zombie Infestation
card.property: Discard two cards: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The nomads' funeral pyres are more practical than ceremonial.

card.name: Act of Treason
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rage courses in every heart, yearning to betray its rational prison." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Blood Ogre
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One thing's for sure—his fists are harder than your skull.

card.name: Chandra, the Firebrand
card.property: +1: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 1 damage to any target. −2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. −6: Chandra, the Firebrand deals 6 damage to each of up to six targets.

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
card.property: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

card.name: Chandra's Phoenix
card.property: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Circle of Flame
card.property: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which do you think is a better deterrent: a moat of water or one of fire?" —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Combust
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Combust deals 5 damage to target white or blue creature. The damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Crimson Mage
card.property: {R}: Target creature you control gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We wield the fires of rage. War is our blood and destruction our birthright." —Crimson creed

card.name: Fiery Hellhound
card.property: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's nothing more exciting than a game of fetch the still-beating heart.

card.name: Fireball
card.property: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

card.name: Firebreathing
card.property: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mage breathed in life-giving air and breathed out death-bringing fire.

card.name: Flameblast Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever Flameblast Dragon attacks, you may pay {X}{R}. If you do, Flameblast Dragon deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He marks his territory with fire and wrath, etching the mountainside with his charring breath.

card.name: Fling
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: About halfway to the target, Snukk vowed that he had been tricked for the last time.

card.name: Furyborn Hellkite
card.property: Bloodthirst 6 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Careful. A drop of blood here means death for us all." —Kalek, mountain guide

card.name: Goblin Arsonist
card.property: When Goblin Arsonist dies, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With great power comes great risk of getting yourself killed.

card.name: Goblin Bangchuckers
card.property: {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Goblin Bangchuckers deals 2 damage to any target. If you lose the flip, Goblin Bangchuckers deals 2 damage to itself.

card.name: Goblin Chieftain
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 and have haste.

card.name: Goblin Fireslinger
card.property: {T}: Goblin Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A rock between your eyes hurts. A burning rock between your eyes ruins your whole day.

card.name: Goblin Grenade
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin. Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't underestimate the aerodynamic qualities of the common goblin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once he'd worked out which end of the thing was sharp, he was promoted to guard duty.

card.name: Goblin Tunneler
card.property: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best way over the mountain is through."

card.name: Goblin War Paint
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secret to our war paint is hot peppers and stinkbugs. Lots of stinkbugs." —Skab, goblin secretkeeper

card.name: Gorehorn Minotaurs
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

card.name: Grim Lavamancer
card.property: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

card.name: Incinerate
card.property: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Spontaneous combustion is a myth. If you burst into flame, someone wanted you to." —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Inferno Titan
card.property: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.property: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It can chop down a redwood in a single stroke. Your sternum isn't going to fare any better.

card.name: Lightning Elemental
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, it's easy enough to kill, but I'm not going anywhere near it." —Norin the Wary

card.name: Manabarbs
card.property: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, Manabarbs deals 1 damage to that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know why people say a double-edged sword is bad. It's a sword. With two edges." —Kamahl, pit fighter

card.name: Manic Vandal
card.property: When Manic Vandal enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's fun. He doesn't need another reason.

card.name: Reverberate
card.property: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For every action, there is a swifter and more violent reaction.

card.name: Scrambleverse
card.property: For each nonland permanent, choose a player at random. Then each player gains control of each permanent for which they were chosen. Untap those permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes a little chaos is in order.

card.name: Shock
card.property: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The beauty of it is they never see it coming. Ever." —Razzix, sparkmage

card.name: Slaughter Cry
card.property: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's rather embarrassing to end up with your head mounted over his hearth.

card.name: Stormblood Berserker
card.property: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blood is holy to those whose god is War.

card.name: Tectonic Rift
card.property: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will kneel before me, even if I have to split the earth under your feet!" —Ash Kronor, Keldon warlord

card.name: Volcanic Dragon
card.property: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.

card.name: Wall of Torches
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The foolish try to leap through the unlit spaces. The arrogant believe the fires harmless. The wise find a different door.

card.name: Warstorm Surge
card.property: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Listen to the roar! Feel the thunder! The Immersturm shouts its approval with every bolt of lightning!"

card.name: Acidic Slime
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Arachnus Spinner
card.property: Reach Tap an untapped Spider you control: Search your graveyard and/or library for a card named Arachnus Web and put it onto the battlefield attached to target creature. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Arachnus Web
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

card.name: Autumn's Veil
card.property: Spells you control can't be countered by blue or black spells this turn, and creatures you control can't be the targets of blue or black spells this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rustling of leaves and a passing shadow are a dryad's only trace.

card.name: Birds of Paradise
card.property: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods used their feathers to paint all the colors of the world." —Yare-Tiva, warden of Gramur forest

card.name: Bountiful Harvest
card.property: You gain 1 life for each land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When we fail to see the beauty in every tree, we are no better than humans." —Saelia, elvish scout

card.name: Brindle Boar
card.property: Sacrifice Brindle Boar: You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tell the cooks to prepare the fires. Tonight we feast!" —Tolar Wolfbrother, Krosan tracker

card.name: Carnage Wurm
card.property: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Cudgel Troll
card.property: {G}: Regenerate Cudgel Troll. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Doubling Chant
card.property: For each creature you control, you may search your library for a creature card with the same name as that creature. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What's scarier than one of every beast in the forest?

card.name: Dungrove Elder
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Dungrove Elder's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the trees of the forest are his army, and every leaf his shield.

card.name: Elvish Archdruid
card.property: Other Elf creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Add {G} for each Elf you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He knows the name of every elf born in the last four centuries. More importantly, they all know his.

card.name: Fog
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard enough to find your way through uncharted wilderness when you can see the tip of your nose.

card.name: Garruk, Primal Hunter
card.property: +1: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. −3: Draw cards equal to the greatest power among creatures you control. −6: Create a 6/6 green Wurm creature token for each land you control.

card.name: Garruk's Companion
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Garruk's Horde
card.property: Trample Play with the top card of your library revealed. You may cast the top card of your library if it's a creature card. (Do this only any time you could cast that creature card. You still pay the spell's costs.)

card.name: Giant Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wild is always changing, but it does have a few constants." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Gladecover Scout
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The forest is my cover and I hold it close. In such a tight embrace, there is no room for wickedness."

card.name: Greater Basilisk
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bone, stone . . . both taste the same to a hungry basilisk.

card.name: Hunter's Insight
card.property: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The predator knows the true way of the world. Life is conflict. Only the strong survive." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Jade Mage
card.property: {2} {G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are one with the wild things. Life blooms from our fingertips and nature responds to our summons." —Jade creed

card.name: Llanowar Elves
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. —Llanowar penalty for trespassing

card.name: Lure
card.property: Enchant creature All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It makes the insignificant conspicuous, the repulsive alluring, and the deadly irresistible.

card.name: Lurking Crocodile
card.property: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Overrun
card.property: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Plummet
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." —Dejara, Giltwood druid

card.name: Primeval Titan
card.property: Trample Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Primordial Hydra
card.property: Primordial Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Primordial Hydra. Primordial Hydra has trample as long as it has ten or more +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature grows solutions to its problems.

card.name: Reclaim
card.property: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wise pay as much attention to what they throw away as to what they keep.

card.name: Rites of Flourishing
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. Each player may play an additional land on each of their turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dance, and bring forth the coil! It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only honey it wants is the sweet nectar flowing through your veins.

card.name: Sacred Wolf
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I raised my bow, and the wolf stared at me. Under its gaze, my finger would not release the string." —Aref the Hunter

card.name: Skinshifter
card.property: {G}: Choose one — • Until end of turn, Skinshifter becomes a Rhino with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains trample. Activate this ability only once each turn. • Until end of turn, Skinshifter becomes a Bird with base power and toughness 2/2 and gains flying. Activate this ability only once each turn. • Until end of turn, Skinshifter becomes a Plant with base power and toughness 0/8. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Stampeding Rhino
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The quickest way to get through the jungle is to agitate a rhino and run in its wake.

card.name: Stingerfling Spider
card.property: Reach When Stingerfling Spider enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The juiciest prey is that which grows lazy, thinking itself beyond the reach of danger.

card.name: Titanic Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pup looked over the treetops, eyeing the man who just yesterday had kicked her. Suddenly, her hunger was infused with pure delight.

card.name: Trollhide
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature." (The next time the creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The gorger's insect-like eyes pick up the slightest movement in any direction. Its body then whips toward its prey with startling speed, swallowing it in one engulfing gulp.

card.name: Adaptive Automaton
card.property: As Adaptive Automaton enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types. Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Such loyalty can only be made.

card.name: Angel's Feather
card.property: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The angel represents divine perfection; even the smallest feather is imbued with beauty and benevolence.

card.name: Crown of Empires
card.property: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature. Gain control of that creature instead if you control artifacts named Scepter of Empires and Throne of Empires.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With this crown, assert your authority." —Crown inscription

card.name: Crumbling Colossus
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) When Crumbling Colossus attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.

card.name: Demon's Horn
card.property: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.

card.name: Dragon's Claw
card.property: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If there is a fire that never ceases to burn, it surely lies in the maw of a dragon." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Druidic Satchel
card.property: {2}, {T}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. If it's a land card, put that card onto the battlefield under your control. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Elixir of Immortality
card.property: {2}, {T}: You gain 5 life. Shuffle Elixir of Immortality and your graveyard into their owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bottled life. Not as tasty as I'm used to, rather stale, but it has the same effect." —Baron Sengir

card.name: Greatsword
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+0. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only blow that matters is the killing blow.

card.name: Kite Shield
card.property: Equipped creature gets +0/+3. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To my sword I owe my glory, but to my shield I owe my life." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

card.name: Kraken's Eye
card.property: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's seen the wonders of entire worlds trapped in the depths of a bottomless ocean.

card.name: Manalith
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Planeswalkers seek out great monuments throughout the Multiverse, knowing that their builders were unknowingly drawn by the convergence of mana in the area.

card.name: Pentavus
card.property: Pentavus enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Pentavus: Create a 1/1 colorless Pentavite artifact creature token with flying. {1}, Sacrifice a Pentavite: Put a +1/+1 counter on Pentavus.

card.name: Quicksilver Amulet
card.property: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who examine the amulet too closely have been known to become part of its ornate carvings.

card.name: Rusted Sentinel
card.property: Rusted Sentinel enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has to deliberate a moment on the best way to break your face.

card.name: Scepter of Empires
card.property: {T}: Scepter of Empires deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. It deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker instead if you control artifacts named Crown of Empires and Throne of Empires.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With this scepter, smite your enemies." —Scepter inscription

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.property: When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

card.name: Sundial of the Infinite
card.property: {1}, {T}: End the turn. Activate this ability only during your turn. (Exile all spells and abilities on the stack. Discard down to your maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.property: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. Equip {1}

card.name: Thran Golem
card.property: As long as Thran Golem is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The golems of the ancient Thran still draw power in ways that baffle the artificers of today.

card.name: Throne of Empires
card.property: {1}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. Create five of those tokens instead if you control artifacts named Crown of Empires and Scepter of Empires.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With this throne, unite your nation." —Throne inscription

card.name: Worldslayer
card.property: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy all permanents other than Worldslayer. Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If that is what you seek, try looking in craters." —Fodrus, mastersmith

card.name: Wurm's Tooth
card.property: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jevna Nor lugged it around, bragging of his triumph over the wurm. Luckily, the tavern regulars didn't notice it was only a baby tooth.

card.name: Buried Ruin
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buried Ruin: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: History has buried its treasures deep.

card.name: Dragonskull Summit
card.property: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

card.name: Drowned Catacomb
card.property: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Glacial Fortress
card.property: Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Rootbound Crag
card.property: Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Sunpetal Grove
card.property: Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.
